bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of unspecified types of ying liu 癭瘤 , goiter tumor. The term shui ying 水 癭 , water goiter , is rarely seen in ancient medical texts; the illness signs of this condition are not described anywhere. The term itself suggests a pliable bag-like swelling filled with liquid. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 23: 崔氏云凡水癭、氣癭可瘥，石癭不可 治 , “Mr. Cui states: All cases of water goiter and qi goiter can be cured. Stone goiter is incurable”.
